wikipedia_page.main: William Lambert McGhie (born 19 January 1958) is a Scottish former professional footballer who played as a winger in the Football League for Leeds United and York City and in Danish football for B 1903. He was a Scotland youth international.

response: *Billy McGhie (footballer, born 1961), Scottish professional footballer and manager
